title: Pet Detectives
description:
It’s every dog owner’s worst nightmare. A beloved dog goes missing on vacation. But when the dog belongs to two former police officers — the investigation takes an unbelievable turn that leaves Mr. Malone and his dog Steve on the edge of their seats.

Follow Mr. Malone on Twitter and Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!
